tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Every patient wishes for a painless tooth procedure that is exactly what is assured with Dr Mohan.he patiently explains every step of the procedure as it is done which makes the patient feel extremely relaxed ..people generally delay dental procedures due to fear of pain or delay  in  completion  but With Dr Mohan  we are assured of a swift and painless procedure.have earlier done a dental procedure here on the recommendation of my brother and have been extremely satisfied.My sincere thanks to Dr .Mohan and Practo for making visiting a dental clinic such a comfortable experience for the patient.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback. Thank you for your trust in us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
**** ** *** **** ****** ****** ** ******* both doctors are really good in explaining the actual cause of the dental problem,  treats them with at most precision; the background play music while treatment really helps out with relieving stress and anxiety of the patients. Also they give personnel protective equipements for the patients during xray (ie,opg scan), laser treatment. oral retractor greatly helps during the course of treatment, by preventing injury of tongue or other gum parts. 

Im really happy and blessed to have my dental treatment here.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your appreciative words. Thank you for your trust in us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Currently i am taking teeth implant treatment in Yours Dentally - Laser Dental  Clinic.
I would like to say a  big ‘Thank You’ to 
DR. R S Mohan Kumar as he is very friendly also he is well aware I am a somewhat nervous patient, exacerbated by particularly unpleasant memories of dental treatment which resulted in me avoiding the dentist altogether for a number of years.However since coming to Yours Dentally I have always found DR. R S Mohan Kumar and his team to make the experience as stress free as possible for me.  I am so impressed that he took the time and effort to talk me though the process and explain each step in detailed. Thanks again for his care and kind treatment.
reply_text: Thank u so much madam for your positive feedback and appreciative word. Thanks for your trust in us.

review:
I had met Dr.Mohan as I was suffering from sevier pain on my tooth which had to be treated with Root Canal Treatment. 
First of all, The appointments are very organized and as Root canal treatment involves multiple visits, Not even once I had to wait for my turn which saved a lot of my time.
The clinic ambience and the hygiene is top class.
Doctor used state of the art instruments,tools, Microscope and Laser to treat my Problem due to with there was minimum pain and doctor could even see the minute details and treated it.
The treatment cost was very minimal and I got best results.My pain is completely gone and after 5 months, I can actually chew food with both the sides of my jaw.
Am very happy with the results and I definitely recommended Dr.Mohan to everyone.
reply_text: thank you Mr Varun for your feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am a senior citizen undergoing full denture treatment under Dr.Mohan and his wife Dr.Pavithra.He has recommended implants for the lower jaw
His personal care with quality treatment makes me feel that * **** ****** *** **** *******I feel more at ease and confident whenever I go for the treatment. Thanks a lot doctors Mohan and Pavithra.
reply_text: thank u madam for your feedback and appreciation .

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Experience at Yours Dentally was a complete satisfying one. Dr Mohan is a friendly and down to earth person. The clinic is a multi specialised with clean and tidy ambience. Fixture of the appointment slots and reminders through phone calls and emails were very helpful. 
I would strongly recommend Yours Dentally to the people of Chennai.
reply_text: thank you shylesh for your appreciative words

review: Perfectly planned by Dr.Mohan and Dr.Pavitra kind of teeth alignments and appropriate tooth extractions needed for her jaw shape. visits we had made for tooth extractions as her body was sensitive and sometimes not accepting the local anesthesia. Patiently handled my daughter and now we visit for her braces sessions and we see beautifully aligned teeth. Thank Dr. Pavitra and Mohan
reply_text: Thanks u madam for your appreciative words. Thanks for the feedback

review: The doctor explained me the entire process and made me very comfortable even though I was scared about the process. The entire process of tooth filling took about an hour but was made to be relaxed and soothed. Very much happy with the treatment! Though the treatment was expensive, worth every penny.

I am very happy with Dr Mohan and the way he handles the patient. People who really afraid about root canal treatment you can consult Dr Mohan ,he will be right person and will not feel much pain during treatment process.

I am happy and my problem solved .
reply_text: thank you sruthi for your feedback.

review: Dr. Mohan and Dr. Pavithra were amazing and they were very friendly and they explained my dental issues in details and suggest me the best cost optimized model to fix my crown and implants. I strongly recommend Dr. Mohan and Dr. Pavithra. Thanks Dr.Mohan I really has very good experience !!!!
